author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police have asked bank account holders not to disclose the details of ATM card and password to strangers who come in the pretext of helping to withdraw cash at ATM kiosks.

The alert was made following complaints of a stranger withdrawing cash from accounts of persons whom he helped to withdraw cash at the ATM kiosks.

Usage of ATM

According to police sources, the said person usually has been targeting people who are not familiar with usage of ATM card and the elderly persons who might not be able to read the instructions on the ATM screen.

He collects the details of the ATM cards and then use the same to withdraw cash at later stages, sources said.

Photograph

released

The Tirupur city police have also released a photograph of the person obtained from one of the ATM centres.
title: ‘Do not disclose bank details to strangers’
